SELECT IWT.SHIPPING_TIME "shippingTime", ITT.WMS_TRANSFER_NAME "billType", CASE WHEN IWT.ORDER_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SWLO.COMPANY_NAME ELSE SWTP.NAME END "transferName", SWW.WAREHOUSE_NAME "wareHouse", CASE IWT.TRANS_TYPE WHEN '0' THEN '良品' WHEN '1' THEN '次品' ELSE IWT.TRANS_TYPE END "transferType", IWTG.TRANSFER_ID "transferId", IWTG.QUANTITY "quantity", IWS.SKU_CODE "sku", IWS.SKU_NAME "name", IWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", IWT.PO "outOrderCode" FROM SYN_WMS_TRANSFER IWT LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS IWTG ON IWTG.TRANSFER_ID = IWT.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU IWS ON IWTG.SKU_ID = IWS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_WAREHOUSE SWW ON IWT.WAREHOUSE_ID = SWW.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_TRANSFER_PARTNER SWTP ON SWTP.ID = IWT.TRANSFER_SALE LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_LARGE_ORDER SWLO ON SWLO.ORDER_CODE = IWT.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN IUNI_TRANSFER_TYPE ITT ON ITT.WMS_TRANSFER_CODE = IWT.BILL_TYPE
AND IWT.STATUS = '2'
AND IWT.SHIPPING_TIME >= to_date(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IWT.SHIPPING_TIME < to_date(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')+1
ORDER BY IWT.SHIPPING_TIME, IWTG.TRANSFER_ID, IWS.SKU_CODE

SELECT SWR.HANDLED_TIME "handledTime", CASE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE WHEN '104' THEN '调拨退货' WHEN '107' THEN '调拨换货退回' ELSE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE END "receiveType", SWR.WAREHOUSE_NAME "wareHouse", SWR.TRANSFER_PARTNER_NAME "transferPartnerName", SWR.RECEIVE_CODE "receiveCode", SWRG.QUANTITY "quantity", CASE SWRG.WARES_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN '良品' WHEN '1' THEN '次品' ELSE SWRG.WARES_STATUS END "wareStatus", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.SKU_NAME "name", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode" FROM SYN_WMS_RECEIVE SWR LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_RECEIVE_GOODS SWRG ON SWR.ID = SWRG.RECEIVE_ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWRG.SKU_ID = SWS.ID
SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE IN ('104', '107') AND SWR.HANDLING_STATUS = '1' AND (SWRG.USE_FLAG IS NULL OR SWRG.USE_FLAG <> '0')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME >= to_date(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME < to_date(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')+1
ORDER BY SWR.HANDLED_TIME, SWR.WAREHOUSE_ID, SWR.RECEIVE_CODE, SWRG.SKU_CODE, SWRG.WARES_STATUS
